mapper.select: SELECT option_id, site_id, comp_id, category, option_code, option_value, option_builder, use_yn, description FROM tco_option WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY category, option_id

mapper.update: UPDATE tco_option SET option_code = #{optionCode}, option_value = #{optionValue}, option_builder = #{optionBuilder}, use_yn = #{useYn}, description = #{description} WHERE option_id = #{optionId}
